text: Paramount Global (doing business as Paramount) was founded in December 4, 2019, and defunct in July 7, 2025 to precede Paramount Skydance Corporation along with Skydance Media and CBS Paramount Media, and it was formerly known as ViacomCBS (2019-22). == References == Category:2019 establishments in the United States Category:American entertainment companies Category:Columbia Broadcasting System Category:Companies based in New York City Category:Companies listed on NASDAQ Category:Media in the United States Category:Viacom
title: Paramount Global
